page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN SOUTHWATER
page.content: {SOUTHWATER HAS 34 INDUSTRIAL UNITS {BUILT BETWEEN 1974 & 1982}USED FOR LIGHT INDUSTRIAL WORK,WAREHOUSES & OFFICES.MARTONAIR LTD. IS A{WAREHOUSE WHICH HAS BEEN HERE FOR 10 YEARS, EMPLOYING 5 LOCAL PEOPLE.THEY HAVE 30 BRANCHES IN ENGLAND.DALBY MILES ARE AN {ENGINEERING FACTORY}WITH 5 BIG MACHINES,EMPLOYING 14 PEOPLE (ONLY 2 ARE LOCAL).THEY CAME 11 YRS AGO BECAUSE THESE WERE THE LARGEST PREMISES AVAILABLE.CROYDON PRESS LITHO ARE A{PRINTING FIRM,}ALSO HERE FOR 11 YRS, WHO EMPLOY 8 PEOPLE(3 ARE LOCAL). OF THE 34 UNITS ONLY 4 WERE EMPTY. MR.LEES TOLD US THAT THE SUN ALLIANCE BUILDING,PHASES 1&2 OF WHICH ARE NOW BEING BUILT,ON THE OLD BRICK WORKS SITE,BY THE COUNTRY PARK, WILL EMPLOY 150 PEOPLE(10 TO 15 LOCAL) TO WORK ON COMPUTERS DEALING WITH{CAR INSURANCE.
